uid  Help
The globally unique identifier.
  		uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		pk
required

A short single line non-unique description.
  		name
max length: 50
allows( printable )

The free-form multi-line description.
  		multiline1000
max length: 100
allows( printable ,  whitespace )

  		letterCode
max length: 1

  		lockVersion
